summary: This document is a unanimous consent resolution by the Board of Trustees of the J. Epstein Virgin Islands Foundation, Inc. It outlines the appointment of officers, including Jeffrey Epstein as President, and authorizes the opening and maintenance of bank accounts with Deutsche Bank, granting the President full authority over these accounts.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the President of the J. Epstein Virgin Islands Foundation, Inc., responsible for managing the corporation's bank accounts.

persons.name: Darren K. Indyke
persons.context: Darren K. Indyke is mentioned as the Vice President of the corporation, involved in the governance of the foundation.

persons.name: Erika Kellerhals
persons.context: Erika Kellerhals is noted as the Treasurer and Secretary of the corporation, participating in the board's resolutions.

keyFacts: The document is a unanimous consent resolution by the Board of Trustees of the J. Epstein Virgin Islands Foundation, Inc.
Jeffrey Epstein is appointed as the President of the corporation.
Darren K. Indyke and Erika Kellerhals are appointed as Vice President and Treasurer/Secretary, respectively.
The resolution authorizes the opening of bank accounts with Deutsche Bank.
The President is granted full authority over the bank accounts without needing further approvals from the Trustees.
